column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Being an East Coast guy I was curious to try the authentic deep dish of Chicago.  Everyone pointed out that Lou Malnatti's was the best.  The hearty chunky sauce was really good
column2: better than Bertucci's (only way to compare on the east coast) and the cheese was heavy.  I have a huge appetite and could only finish 2 slices.  Don't order a pizza with the spicy peppers.  Its ingrained in the sauce and was way too hot.  Good pizza is you want a real full meal but no need to order a lot.
